## BlockSvg.setWarningText() method

Set this block's warning text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWarningText(text: string | null, id?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string \| null | The text, or null to delete. |
|  id | string | _(Optional)_ An optional ID for the warning text to be able to maintain multiple warnings. |

**Returns:**

void
